title._content: Dr. Don Francisco J. Peynado - Dominican Minister  (LOC)

tag.raw: Sr. Dr. Don Francisco J Peynado
tag.author: 13267298@N00

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Dr. Don Francisco J. Peynado - Dominican Minister [1913 Jan. 1] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photo shows Dr. Don Francisco J. Peynado, Ambassador of the Dominican Republic to the United States at the Diplomatic Corps Reception on New Year's Day, 1913 at the Pan American Building, Washington D. C. African-American man with megaphone stands behind Peynado. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2009) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.12908 Call Number: LC-B2- 2682-15

note._content: what is this fellow doing with the megaphone?
note.author: 11572312@N00
